name: Word Dungeon
description:
Hello and welcome to Word Dungeon, my submission to 7drl-challenge-2022.

Combine words to survive in a labyrinth of hostile entities made out of (guess what?) words.

CONTROLS:

LEFT CLICK on an entity to see what WORDS make it.

DRAG RIGHT CLICK to change your VIEW.

Use WASD to move, move towards an entity to ATTACK it.

When a white (one word) entity is defeated, it is added to your inventory.

Drag entities from the inventory to red "Nothings" to COMBINE them.

Click on an empty spaces to SUMMON an entity.

Entities affect each other when they are in the SAME ROOM.

You are an entity too. Good luck.
